headline: PFEIFFER VACUUM UNIVERSAL DRY BACKING PUMP SYSTEM
description: Universal Dry Vacuum Pump System.  For harsh duty processes.
keywords: roots blowers stacks pump stacks blower packages
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Vacuum Pumps > Vacuum Pumping Systems
specstable:
Manufacturer Pfeiffer Vacuum
Model WOT 400-D4
Dry Pump YES
Pumping Speed 347.3 CFM (9,813.8 l/m)
Ultimate Pressure 2.25E-3(En) torr (3.00E-3 mbar)
Inlet Flange ISO-F 100.0 mm (3.937 in)
Exhaust Flange KF 40.0 mm (1.575 in)
Backing Pump Model DBP 050-4
Roots Pump Model WKP 500A
Accessories Programmable control, Panelware 125.
RS 232 Interface
Other Information Gas ballast: 8-40 slm
Motor rating: 5.2kW
Uses Perfluorpolyether F5 oil
Power Requirements 480 V 60 Hz 3 Phase
CE Marked YES
Exterior Dimensions
Width 50.650 in (128.7 cm)
Height 51.260 in (130.2 cm)
Weight 756 lb (343 kg)
